alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jefferson; Shelby; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 3:08PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Tuscaloosa, west central Shelby, northeastern Bibb and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 307 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lake View to near Pelham. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hoover, Alabaster, Bessemer, Pelham, Helena, Chelsea, Columbiana, Indian Springs Village, Lake View, Vance, Woodstock, North Johns, Tannehill Ironworks State Park, Abernant, Oak Mountain State Park, Maylene, Oak Mountain Amphitheater, Riverchase, Hoover Metropolitan Stadium and Shelby County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
